person.persName: Richard S. Ferguson (Jessamine County, Kentucky, judge)

body.p: Jessamine County, Kentucky, farmer and judge. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth H. Chrisman Ferguson. Father of Elizabeth G. Ferguson, Richard Ferguson, Hector Chrisman Ferguson, William G. Ferguson, and Margaret Ferguson. Farmer in Jessamine County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned eleven enslaved persons in Jessamine County, Kentucky, in 1850. Presiding judge in Jessamine County from 1862 to 1863.
